text: Idy 754 TTHN gfear<ut (7345 4aev &7 rTATf HART, HRa TGR) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) 07a T vft-5 Q 6, 7c7-10, ERqF, 7ff @aft 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 TI9/Phone 91-11-25074100 / 25074200 NHAIPolicy Guidelines/ IT /2022 Policy Circular No.6.34/2022 dated O9th November, 2022 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. NHAI/IT /procurement of computer/RO-PIU/202O (Comp.No. 9294)} Sub.: Providing IT assets and internet connectivity for efficient disbursing payments in BhumiRashi Portal reg: Please refer Policy Circular No. 11041/217/2007-Admn. dated 30.09.2013 regarding Delegation of Powers pertains to land acquisition to Regional Officers and Policy Circular No 6.27/2021 dated 11th October 2021 norms for purchase of computer hardware and peripherals at NHAI Field Offices. 2_ For transparency and faster processing of land acquisition cases including disbursement of payments, a BhumiRashi portal is being developed by NIC. 3_ To ensure faster processing of land acquisition cases including disbursement of payments through BhumiRashi portal, the CALAs are authorised to purchase requisite IT assets and internet connectivity within the administrative charges being through State Governments. 4 However , in case any CALA makes a specific request to NHAI for making such purchase, the RO may purchase and provide requisite IT system and payment of which may be adjusted within the administrative charges being paid through State Governments: In such cases, as per Policy Circular No. 11041/217/2007-Admn. dated 30.09.2013 regarding delegation of powers pertaining to land acquisition to regional officers, the equipment purchased and issued to CALA shall be treated as grant of equipment and our book of accounts will be reflected accordingly. 5_ This issues with the approval of the Competent Authority: Slx| 22 (Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord.)
